snippet: PELINGER--Joel, died July 7 at 53 years old in La Quinta, CA. Survived by loved ones. Funeral Tuesday, July 19, 11:30am, Beth-El Cemetery, Forest Ave., Paramus, NJ. He will be so missed. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: PELINGER--Joel, died July 7 at 53 years old in La Quinta, CA. Survived by loved ones. Funeral Tuesday, July 19, 11:30am, Beth-El Cemetery, Forest Ave., Paramus, NJ. He will be so missed. 1/3
